account.error_phone_verif: Error with your validation code, please try again.

account.verify_phone_instructions: You should receive a code on your phone number in the next few seconds. Please enter it below to verify your phone number

batch.cannot_edit_macs: Because jobs have already been run on this batch, you cannot edit its MAC addresses

batch.delete_explanation: Are you sure you want to delete this batch? This will revoke all its {{nbCerts}} certificates and delete them. This operation is not revertible

batch.phones_to_notify: Phone numbers to notify when the task is completed
batch.push_changes_explanation: Are you sure you want to push the batch information to all of this batche's certificates?
batch.revoke_explanation: Are you sure you want to revoke this batch? This will revoke all its {{nbCerts}} certificates. This operation is not revertible
batch.success_push: Successfully started push changes job! Job number: {{job}}

dashboard.overall_health_explanation: Average health of all currently connected devices from which we receive health data. The exact calculation is: (Devices=100% * 100 + Devices>90 * 95 + Devices>60 * 75 + Devices<60 * 30) / Connected Devices

dashboard.status_explanation: Status of all devices pointing at this controller

firmware.edit_default_title: This is the current firmware that is used as the minimum version for new APs of type {{deviceType}}. If a new {{deviceType}} AP connects to the gateway, it will be automatically upgraded to this version.
firmware.fetching_defaults: Fetching all available firmware for selected device types...

form.captive_web_root_explanation: Please use .tar files only (no compressed files like .targz, for example)
form.certificate_file_explanation: Please use a .pem file that starts with "-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----" and ends with "-----END CERTIFICATE-----"
form.invalid_alphanumeric_with_dash: Accepted chars. are only alphanumeric (letters & numbers)
form.invalid_file_content: Invalid file content, please confirm that it is of the valid format
form.invalid_hostname: Invalid hostname: it needs to be composed of alphanumeric characters and dashes only
form.invalid_icon_lang: Invalid language, it should be in a 3-letter format (eng, fre, ger, ita, etc.)
form.invalid_ieee: For this encryption protocol,  ieee80211w needs to be either 'optional' or 'required'
form.invalid_ieee_required: ieee80211w needs to be 'required' for this encryption protocol
form.invalid_interfaces: Invalid Interfaces JSON string. Please confirm that your value is: valid JSON and has interfaces as its only key and that the interfaces value is an array. Example: {"interfaces": []}
form.invalid_lease_time: Invalid lease time value! They need to be in the digitUnit format. For example: 6d2h5m, which means 6 days, 2 hours and 5 minutes. Here are the accepted units: m, h, d. If you do not want to use a unit, omit it completely. So instead of saying 0d2h0m, use 2h
form.invalid_password: Invalid password, please look at the password policy
form.invalid_phone_numbers: One or more of the phone numbers are invalid. Please provide them without symbols and spaces, or in this format: +1(123)123-1234
form.invalid_port_range: Invalid port value. It needs to be more than 0 and less than 65 535. If using a port range, please make sure the second port is a higher number than the first one.
form.invalid_port_ranges: Invalid port range combination! Please make sure both port values are the same type (single or range). If they are ranges, make sure they are both covering the same amount of ports
form.invalid_proto_6g: This encryption protocol cannot be used on an SSID which uses 6G
form.invalid_select_ports: Incompatible values between interfaces! Please make sure that there is no duplicate PORT/VLAN ID combination between your interfaces
form.invalid_static_ipv4_d: Invalid address, this range reserved for multicasting (class D). The first octet should be 223 or lower
form.invalid_static_ipv4_e: Invalid address, this range reserved for experiments (class E). The first octet should be 223 or lower
form.invalid_third_party: Invalid Third Party JSON string. Please confirm that your value is a valid JSON
form.key_file_explanation: Please use a .pem file that starts with "-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----" and ends with "-----END PRIVATE KEY-----"
form.min_max_string: Value needs to be of a length between {{min}} (inclusive) and {{max}} (inclusive)
form.missing_interface_upstream: You need to have at least one upstream interface. At the moment, all your interfaces are downstream

inventory.invalid_serial_number: Invalid serial number. A serial number should only be 12 HEX chars (A-F, 0-9)
inventory.no_computed: No Computed Configuration: you will need to assign a valid configuration to see it
